introduction_japanese: 手術は、病院やクリニックで体の治療や検査のために行う行為について話すときによく使う言葉です。手を使った細かい操作や医師が患者の治療をする場面で聞きます。
introduction_english: The noun しゅじゅつ is commonly seen when talking about medical treatment performed in hospitals or clinics, especially when a doctor operates on a patient.
meaning_explanation_japanese: 「手術」は、けがや病気を治すために医師が体に手を入れたり器具を使って行う処置のことです。昔は『手先の技術』という意味でも使われましたが、今は主に医療の手術を指します。
meaning_explanation_english: The word しゅじゅつ means a medical operation or surgical procedure where a doctor treats a problem by operating on the body. Historically it could also mean manual skill or sleight of hand, but today it mainly means surgery.

common_words: 上手 (じょうず): skillful, good at
技術 (ぎじゅつ): technique, technology
魔術 (まじゅつ): magic, sorcery

kanji_explanation: The first kanji means hand. It shows the idea of using your hand or doing something by hand, and you see it in words like てがみ and じょうず where the sense of hand or skill is clear. The second kanji means art, technique, or skill. It appears in words like ぎじゅつ and まじゅつ where it gives the idea of technique, craft, or magic.
synonyms: オペ : おぺ : colloquial for an operation
施術 : しじゅつ : medical procedure or treatment
synonym_explanation: The most common synonyms of the しゅじゅつ are オペ and しじゅつ. オペ is casual, often used in conversation to mean an operation. しじゅつ is a more general term for a medical procedure or treatment and can be used when not strictly surgical.
antonym_explanation: The most common antonym[s] of the しゅじゅつ are ... No common antonyms found.

example_sentences.furigana: 手術(しゅじゅつ)を受(う)ける。

translations.MY: ခွဲစိတ်မှုခံယူပါ။

example_sentences.furigana: 医者(いしゃ)が手術(しゅじゅつ)をする。

translations.VI: Bác sĩ tiến hành phẫu thuật.
translations.FR: Le médecin pratique une intervention chirurgicale.
translations.TL: Ang doktor ay nagsasagawa ng operasyon.
translations.MY: ဆရာဝန်က ခွဲစိတ်မှုလုပ်တယ်။

example_sentences.furigana: 明日(あした)、手術日(しゅじゅつび)です。

translations.ES: Mañana es el día de la cirugía.
translations.VI: Ngày mai là ngày phẫu thuật.
translations.FR: Demain c'est le jour de l'opération.
translations.MY: မနက်​ဖြန်​က ခွဲစိတ်​မှု​နေ့။

example_sentences.kanji: 手術中は静かにしてください。
example_sentences.furigana: 手術中(しゅじゅつちゅう)は静(しず)かにしてください。

translations.EN: Please remain quiet during the procedure.
translations.ID: Harap tetap tenang selama prosedur berlangsung.
translations.ES: Por favor, permanezca en silencio durante el procedimiento.
translations.VI: Xin hãy giữ im lặng trong suốt quá trình.
translations.FR: Veuillez rester silencieux pendant la procédure.
translations.BN: প্রক্রিয়া চলাকালীন দয়া করে চুপ থাকুন।
translations.ZH: 请在手术过程中保持安静。
translations.TL: Mangyaring manatiling tahimik sa panahon ng pamamaraan.
translations.MY: လုပ်ထုံးလုပ်နည်းအတွင်း တိတ်ဆိတ်စွာနေပါ။
translations.HI: कृपया प्रक्रिया के दौरान शांत रहें।
translations.FA: لطفا در طول عمل سکوت را رعایت کنید.

example_sentences.kanji: 手術後に安静が必要です。
example_sentences.furigana: 手術後(しゅじゅつご)に安静(あんせい)が必要(ひつよう)です。

translations.EN: You will need to rest after the surgery.
translations.ES: Necesitará descansar después de la cirugía.
translations.VI: Bạn sẽ cần nghỉ ngơi sau phẫu thuật.
translations.FR: Vous devrez vous reposer après l’opération.
translations.NE: शल्यक्रिया पछि तपाईंलाई आराम गर्न आवश्यक पर्नेछ।
translations.BN: অস্ত্রোপচারের পর তোমার বিশ্রামের প্রয়োজন হবে।
translations.TL: Kakailanganin mong magpahinga pagkatapos ng operasyon.
translations.MY: ခွဲစိတ်ပြီးနောက် အနားယူရန် လိုအပ်ပါသည်။
translations.HI: सर्जरी के बाद आपको आराम की आवश्यकता होगी।
translations.AR: سوف تحتاج إلى الراحة بعد الجراحة.
translations.FA: بعد از عمل جراحی نیاز به استراحت خواهید داشت.

example_sentences.furigana: 緊急手術(きんきゅうしゅじゅつ)が行(おこな)われた。

translations.VI: Đã tiến hành phẫu thuật khẩn cấp.
translations.FR: Une intervention chirurgicale d’urgence a été réalisée.
translations.MY: အရေးပေါ် ခွဲစိတ်မှု ပြုလုပ်ခဲ့ပါသည်။

surgery.MY: ခွဲစိတ်မှု

skill with one's hands.VI: kỹ năng với đôi tay của một người
skill with one's hands.MY: လက်ဖြင့်ကျွမ်းကျင်သည်။
